name: ally-switch
flavor_text: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.
effect_text_extend: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.  If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
effect_text_simple: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
